page.title: 04Employment and Industry
page.content: The area is lucky as it has not too much unemployment. On the edge of Waterhouses is a newly built industrial estate. One of the units is occupied by a pottery-making company producing plant pot novelties. There are 8 full time workers and 28 part timers. Another of the units is used by a firm which sells greeting cards, gift wrapping paper, stationery and art-work film. 3 people are employed here and 6 or 7 part time workers when required. Near to the factory units is an agricultural supplier and petrol station, which employs 7 full time workers. There are a lot of farms in the area. Usually the men on the smaller farms have another job. But local employment is dominated by the quarry.(See page 3).
